skills.skill: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field

duties_responsibilities.duty: Build year-round client relationships and provide tax preparation, tax audit support, and tax planning.
Conduct tax interviews face to face and through virtual tools (video conferencing, phone, chat, email).
Generate business growth, increase client retention, and offer additional products and services.
Grow tax expertise and work in a fast-paced, supportive environment.
Complete 18-hour continuing education requirement and meet all IRS and applicable state requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field
